item.text: Then Jesus entered the synagogue again, and a man was there who had a withered hand.

They <st data-num="3906" class="">watched</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3906">closely</st> to see <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> he would <st data-num="2323" class="">heal</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> on the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> they could <st data-num="2723" class="">accuse</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> who <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> the <st data-num="3584" class="">withered</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>, “<st data-num="1453">Stand up</st> <st data-num="3319" class="">among</st> all these people.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Is it <st data-num="1832" class="">lawful</st> to <st data-num="4160">do</st> <st data-num="18">good</st> on the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2554" class="">evil</st>, to <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> a <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="615" class="">destroy</st> it?” <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3588">they</st> were <st data-num="4623" class="">silent</st>.

After <st data-num="4017">looking around</st><n id="1" /> at <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3709" class="">anger</st>, <st data-num="4818" class="">grieved</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="4457" class="">hardness</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>, “<st data-num="1614" class="">Stretch out</st> your <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>.” He <st data-num="1614" class="">stretched</st> it <st data-num="1614">out</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> was <st data-num="600" class="">restored</st>.<n id="3" />
So the Pharisees went out immediately and began plotting with the Herodians, as to how they could assassinate him.
Then Jesus went away with his disciples to the sea, and a great multitude from Galilee followed him. And from Judea,

<st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2401" class="">Idumea</st>, <st data-num="4008" class="">beyond</st> the <st data-num="2446">Jordan</st> River,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">around</st> <st data-num="5184" class="">Tyre</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4605" class="">Sidon</st><n id="4" /> a <st data-num="4183" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4128" class="">multitude</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> when they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> about the <st data-num="3745" class="">things</st> he had <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st>.

<st data-num="1223" class="">Because of</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>, he <st data-num="2036" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="4142">small boat</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4342" class="">ready</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2443">so</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st><n id="2" /> would <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2346">press</st> toward <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> he had <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st>, <st data-num="5620">so that</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">all</st> who were <st data-num="2192" class="">afflicted</st> with <st data-num="3148" class="">diseases</st> <st data-num="1968">pressed</st> toward <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2443">in order to</st> <st data-num="680" class="">touch</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">whenever</st> the <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2334" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, they <st data-num="4363">fell down before</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2896">cried out</st>, “<st data-num="4771">You</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.”
But he sternly ordered them not to make him known.
Now Jesus went up the mountain and called for those he wanted, and they came to him.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">appointed</st> <st data-num="1427" class="">12</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> they would <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he could <st data-num="649" class="">send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> to <st data-num="2784" class="">preach</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> to <st data-num="1544">cast out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st>.
<n id="1" /> To <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st><n id="2" /> he <st data-num="2007" class="">gave</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter;</st>

to <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2385" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="2491">John</st>, the sons of <st data-num="2199" class="">Zebedee</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2007" class="">gave</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> <st data-num="993" class="">Boanerges</st> (<st data-num="3739">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>, “<st data-num="5207">sons</st> of <st data-num="1027" class="">thunder”);</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="406" class="">Andrew</st>, <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st>, <st data-num="918" class="">Bartholomew</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3156" class="">Matthew</st>, <st data-num="2381" class="">Thomas</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st> the son of <st data-num="256" class="">Alphaeus</st>, <st data-num="2280" class="">Thaddaeus</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> the <st data-num="2581" class="">Zealot</st>,<n id="4" />
and Judas Iscariot, who betrayed him.
Now Jesus went home, and a crowd gathered so that they were not able to eat.

When <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="3588 3844">family</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this they <st data-num="1831" class="">went out</st> to <st data-num="2902" class="">restrain</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “He is <st data-num="1839">out of his mind</st>.”

The <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st><n id="1" /> who <st data-num="2597">came down</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “He is <st data-num="2192" class="">possessed</st> by <st data-num="954" class="">Beelzebul</st>,”<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st>, “<st data-num="1722">By</st> the <st data-num="758" class="">ruler</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> he <st data-num="1544">casts out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st>!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="4341" class="">called</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">spoke</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3850" class="">parables:</st><n id="2" /> “<st data-num="4459">How</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st> <st data-num="1544">cast out</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st>?

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> is <st data-num="3307" class="">divided</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">itself</st>, <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st>.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> a <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> is <st data-num="3307" class="">divided</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">itself</st>, <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st> <st data-num="450" class="">rises</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="2532">and</st> is <st data-num="3307" class="">divided</st>, he is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="235" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="5056" class="">end</st> <st data-num="2192">has come</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> is <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> a <st data-num="2478" class="">strong man’s</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> and <st data-num="1283" class="">steal</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4632" class="">property</st> <st data-num="3362">unless</st> he <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">ties up</st> the <st data-num="2478">strong man</st>. <st data-num="5119">Then</st> he can <st data-num="1283" class="">thoroughly plunder</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>.<n id="2" />

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5207 444" class="">people</st> will be <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st> for <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="265" class="">sins</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="988" class="">blasphemies</st> they <st data-num="987" class="">utter</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3739">whoever</st> <st data-num="987" class="">blasphemes</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">never</st> <st data-num="2192">be</st> <st data-num="859" class="">forgiven</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1777" class="">guilty</st> of an <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="265" class="">sin</st>”<n id="1" />
(because they said, “He has an unclean spirit”).
Then Jesus’ mother and his brothers came. Standing outside, they sent word to him, to summon him.

A <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> was <st data-num="2521" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st><n id="1" /> are <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> <st data-num="2212">looking for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”

He <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>?”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4017">looking at</st> those who were <st data-num="2521">sitting</st> <st data-num="4012">around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> in a <st data-num="2945" class="">circle</st>, he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2396">Here</st><n id="1" /> are <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>!
For whoever does the will of God is my brother and sister and mother.”
